name: Hyper Vortex: Into the Abyss
description:
Hyper Vortex: Into the Abyss is a lightning fast, colorful, almost impossibly hard game for iOS! It is one of the most challenging, fun, exciting experiences you will have all day.

Lasting longer than but a few seconds can be task.

You control your spacecraft by tapping either side of the screen as you fall deeper and deeper into the abyss of an oncoming vortex.

Avoid collision for as long as possible. Keep Calm.
